attributes.action: Make Carnoustie the Permanent venue for the British Open Golf Championship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carnoustie is the one Golf Course guaranteed to test all players and can always throw the unexpected into the equasion making the event thrilling and exciting for players helpers and spectators whilst teaching the true message of sportsmanship and respect for your fellow man and nature.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
